name: notifiarr
description: Notifiarr integrates self-hosted media systems like Plex, Radarr, and Sonarr with alerts, stats, and automation. It sends user notifications and status updates across devices via a configurable UI.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Connect Plex, Radarr, Sonarr, Lidarr, and other *arr applications

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Send alerts and updates to Discord channels with rich embeds

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View media library stats, activity, and system health in one place

features.title: Request Management
features.description: Handle media requests from users with approval workflows

features.title: Calendar Integration
features.description: View upcoming releases and scheduled downloads in calendar format
